name: giraffe-cypress-tests
description: tests for the giraffe cypress framework

scripts.rep:awesome: marge --reportDir site/mochawesome-html-report -t Giraffe_Cypress_Tests -p Cypress_HMTL_Report -f Cypress_HMTL_Report --charts true site/output.json
scripts.rep:clean: rm -rdf cypress/screenshots/; rm -rdf cypress/videos; rm -rdf site
scripts.cy:run: yarn rep:setup && yarn rep:clean && cypress run
scripts.cy:reports: yarn rep:junit; yarn rep:merge; yarn rep:awesome
